quoteText:
we collect location data using Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) (e.g., GPS) and data about nearby cell towers and Wi-Fi hotspots.
Location can also be inferred from a deviceâ€™s IP address or data in your account profile that indicates where it is located with less precision, such as at a city or postal code level.
title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
